verses.1: Aaronʼ suante a kisehkhennate hih bang ahi hi. Aaronʼ tapate: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar ahi uh hi.
verses.2: Ahih hangin a pa uh a sih ma-in Nadab le Abihu si-in ta nei lo uh ahih manin Eleazar le Ithamar-te siampi suak uh hi.
verses.3: Eleazarʼ suan Zadok le Ithamarʼ suan Ahimelekʼ huhna tawh David in amauʼ nasepna ah a kiseh bangin Aaronʼ suante a koih hi.
verses.4: Ithamarʼ suante lak sangin Eleazarʼ suante lakah ukpi tam om zaw ahih manin, amaute in Eleazarʼ suante pawl sawm le guk suahin, Ithamarʼ suante pawl giat suah uh hi.
verses.5: Eleazarʼ suante le Ithamarʼ suante lakah biakinn uliante le Pasianʼ uliante om tuak uh ahih manin amaute in a kibangin aisanna tawh amaute koih uh hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin Levi mi Nethanelʼ tapa ahi lai-at pa Shemaiah in kumpipa, uliante, siampi Zadok, Abiatharʼ tapa Ahimelek, siampite le Levi mi beh lutangteʼ omna ah amaute ciamteh hi. Eleazarʼ suante-aʼ dingin khat kiteelin, tua ciangin Ithamarʼ suante adingin khat kiteel a, kilaihsak niloh uh hi.
verses.7: Aisanna a masa pen Jehoiarib tung, a nihna Jedaiah tung,
verses.8: a thumna Harim tung, a lina Seorim tung,
verses.9: a ngana Malkhijah tung, a gukna Mijamin tung,
verses.10: a sagihna Hakkoz tung, a giatna Abijah tung,
verses.11: a kuana Jeshua tung, a sawmna Shekaniah tung,
verses.12: a sawm le khatna Eliashib tung, a sawm le nihna Jakim tung,
verses.13: a sawm le thumna Huppah tung, a sawm le lina Jeshebeab tung,
verses.14: a sawm le ngana Bilgah tung, a sawm le gukna Immer tung,
verses.15: a sawm le sagihna Hezir tung, a sawm le giatna Happizzez tung,
verses.16: a sawm le kuana Pethahiah tung, a sawm nihna Jehezkel tung,
verses.17: a sawm nih le khatna Jakhin tung, a sawm nih le nihna Gamul tung,
verses.18: a sawm nih le thumna Delaiah tung, a sawm nih le lina Maaziah tungah a tu hi.
verses.19: Hihte in Israel Topa Pasian in amah a thupiak bangin a pupi uh Aaron in amaute-aʼ dingin a kipsak sa ngeina bangin Topaʼ biakinn sungah a pai dingin amauʼ nasep uh ahi a kiseh nasep nei uh hi.
verses.20: Tua ciangin Levi suante a omlaite lakah: Aramʼ suante sung panin Shubaelʼ suante Jehdeiah ahi hi.
verses.21: Rehabiahʼ suante sung panin Isshiah a ukpi ahi hi.
verses.22: Izharʼ suante sung panin Shelomothʼ suante Jahath ahi hi.
verses.23: Hebronʼ suante lakah: Jeriah a ukpi, Amariah a nihna, Jahaziel a thumna, Jekameam a lina ahi hi.
verses.24: Uzzielʼ suante sung panin Mikahʼ suante Shamir ahi hi.
verses.25: Isshiahʼ suante sung panin Zekhariah ahi hi. Mikahʼ sanggampa pen Isshiah ahi hi.
verses.26: Merariʼ suante: Mahli, Mushi le Jaaziah ahi hi.
verses.27: Merariʼ suante Jaaziah sung panin Beno, Shoham, Zakkur le Ibri ahi hi.
verses.28: Mahli in tapa nih, Eleazar le Kish nei hi. Eleazar in tapa nei lo a, Kish in Jerahmeel a kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.30: Mushiʼ tapate: Mahli, Eder le Jerimoth ahi uh hi. Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Leviʼ suante ahi uh hi.
verses.31: Hihte in zong a behte uh ahi Aaronʼ suante mah bangin Kumpi David, Zadok, Ahimelek, siampite le Levi mi beh lutangteʼ muhna ah beh lutangte le a nau pasalte khat ciat in a kibangin aisanna tawh nasep tavuan a la uh hi.
